fullText: The six wives of Henry VIII get to tell their own stories in this energetic British musical that turns trauma into triumph through pop anthems and girl-group solidarity.
dtliExcerpt: The six wives of Henry VIII get to tell their own stories in this energetic British musical that turns trauma into triumph through pop anthems and girl-group solidarity.
